DOC.brief_summary: A dose-ranging study evaluating safety, metabolism and therapeutic dosing of three multiple dose levels of GLY-230 in healthy and diabetic subjects
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Trial of Anti-glycation Agent GLY-230 in Healthy and Diabetic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Nondiabetic and diabetic men age 1855, engative drug screen, normal EKG, clinical chemistries. hematology parameters, HbA1c 7.5% if diabetic, give written informed consent Sctive concomitant serious medical or surgical disease
